headline.main: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit: Hammond
headline.print_headline: UK Needs Financial Reserves in the Tank for Brexit: Hammond

lead_paragraph: Britain's finance minister Philip Hammond said he would keep "reserves in the tank" to see the economy through its looming Brexit challenge, signaling little room for extra spending in this week's budget despite better news on borrowing.
snippet: Britain's finance minister Philip Hammond said he would keep "reserves in the tank" to see the economy through its looming Brexit challenge, signaling little room for extra spending in this week's budget despite better news on borrowing....
